mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RECIPE_LIKES (RECIPE_LIKES_ID, RECIPE_BOARD_ID, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_LIKE) VALUES (RECIPE_LIKES_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{recipeBoardId}, #{memberId}, #{memberLike})
mapper.update: UPDATE RECIPE_LIKES SET MEMBER_LIKE = #{memberLike} WHERE RECIPE_BOARD_ID = #{recipeBoardId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT recipe_board_id, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM RECIPE_LIKES group by recipe_board_id, member_like having member_like=1 ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC

SELECT r.RECIPE_BOARD_ID, COUNT(*) AS LIKE_COUNT FROM RECIPE_LIKES r JOIN MEMBER m ON r.MEMBER_ID = m.MEMBER_ID WHERE r.MEMBER_LIKE = 1
GROUP BY r.RECIPE_BOARD_ID, member_like
GROUP BY r.RECIPE_BOARD_ID, member_like
AND m.MEMBER_AGE between 0 and 9
AND m.MEMBER_AGE between 10 and 19
AND m.MEMBER_AGE between 20 and 29
AND m.MEMBER_AGE between 30 and 39
AND m.MEMBER_AGE between 40 and 49
AND m.MEMBER_AGE >= 50
GROUP BY r.RECIPE_BOARD_ID
GROUP BY r.RECIPE_BOARD_ID, m.MEMBER_GENDER HAVING m.MEMBER_GENDER = #{keyword}
GROUP BY r.RECIPE_BOARD_ID, m.MEMBER_MBTI HAVING m.MEMBER_MBTI = #{keyword}
GROUP BY r.RECIPE_BOARD_ID, m.MEMBER_CONSTELLATION HAVING m.MEMBER_CONSTELLATION = #{keyword}
ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC
